extensionDescription.message: Reverse image search using the most popular search engines, such as Google, Bing, Yandex, Baidu and TinEye.

engineName:google:short.description: Short name of the search engine.

engineName:google:full.description: Full name of the search engine.

engineName:bing:short.description: Short name of the search engine.

engineName:bing:full.description: Full name of the search engine.

engineName:yandex:short.description: Short name of the search engine.

engineName:yandex:full.description: Full name of the search engine.

engineName:baidu:short.description: Short name of the search engine.

engineName:baidu:full.description: Full name of the search engine.

engineName:tineye:short.description: Short name of the search engine.

engineName:tineye:full.description: Full name of the search engine.

contextMenuItemTitle:allEngines:main.description: Title of the context menu item.

contextMenuItemTitle:allEngines:sub.description: Title of the context menu item.

contextMenuItemTitle:engine:main.description: Title of the context menu item.

contextMenuGroupTitle:searchImage:main.description: Title of the context menu group.

optionSectionTitle:engines.description: Title of the search engine options section.

optionSectionDescription:engines.message: Toggle search engines and customize their order (drag and drop)
optionSectionDescription:engines.description: Description of the search engine options section.

optionSectionTitle:misc.description: Title of the miscellaneous options section.

optionTitle:tabInBackgound.message: Open new tabs in the background

dialogTitle:imageSelection.message: Select an image to search for

error:invalidPageUrl.message: The page URL is not valid. Try searching for the image again.

error:sessionExpired.message: The session has expired. Try searching for the image again.

error:invalidImageUrl:dataUri.message: Searching for data URI images is not supported on $ENGINE$.

error:imageNotFound.message: No image found. Try searching again by placing the cursor above the image.

error:internalError.message: Something went wrong. Reload the page before searching again.
